-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Shake File Pack Rule
--   
@package shake-pack
@version 0.1.2


-- | Pack given files into the target with tar and bzip. Uses bz2 C library
--   on the system.
--   
--   <pre>
--   main :: IO ()
--   main = shakeArgs shakeOptions $ do
--       want ["pack.tar.bz2"]
--       "pack.tar.bz2" *&gt; pack ["ex.txt", "ex2.txt"]
--   </pre>
module Development.Shake.Pack

-- | Pack files into a tar then compress with bzip. For static files, be
--   sure to use <a>getDirectoryFiles</a> to track file changes.
pack :: [FilePath] -> FilePath -> Action ()
